net.doo.snap.process

Class OcrResultBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.doo.snap.process.OcrResultBlock

  • public class OcrResultBlock
extends java.lang.Object
    Part of the optical character recognitions result. Each block represents a text paragraph, a text line or a word and contains information about it, like the found text, the bounding box, where in the image the paragraph/line/word can be found, the confidence value and the type.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  OcrResultBlock.OcrResultBlockType
      Represents block types for a text paragraph, a text line or a word.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      OcrResultBlock.OcrResultBlockType blockType
      The type of the block.
      RectF boundingBox
      The bounding box of the receiver in normalized unit coordinate space Left, Top:(0.0, 0.0) - Right, Bottom(1.0, 1.0).
      Rect boundingBoxWithImageSize
      The bounding box of the receiver in absolute image coordinate system.
      java.lang.Float confidenceValue
      The confidence value describes how confident the OCR engine was when detecting the letters and words.
      java.lang.String text
      The recognized text within the receivers bounding box.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OcrResultBlock(java.lang.String text, RectF boundingBox, Rect boundingBoxWithImageSize, java.lang.Float confidenceValue, OcrResultBlock.OcrResultBlockType blockType)

    • Field Detail

      • text

        public final java.lang.String text
        The recognized text within the receivers bounding box.

      • boundingBox

        public final RectF boundingBox
        The bounding box of the receiver in normalized unit coordinate space Left, Top:(0.0, 0.0) - Right, Bottom(1.0, 1.0). Use the boundingBoxWithImageSize method to get the bounding box in absolute image coordinates.

      • boundingBoxWithImageSize

        public final Rect boundingBoxWithImageSize
        The bounding box of the receiver in absolute image coordinate system.

      • confidenceValue

        public final java.lang.Float confidenceValue
        The confidence value describes how confident the OCR engine was when detecting the letters and words. Ranges from 0.0 (not confident) to 100.0 (very confident).

      • blockType

        public final OcrResultBlock.OcrResultBlockType blockType
        The type of the block. OcrResultBlock.OcrResultBlockType.

                      OcrResultBlock.OcrResultBlockType blockType)
